name: smart-join
description: **Roblox Best Server Selector** is a lightweight browser extension that helps Roblox players find and join the optimal servers for any game.

scripts.build:ext: npm run build && mkdir -p dist && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/*.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/*.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/_locales dist/_locales 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ext && npm run build:site
